Description: Red-brown pottery ostracon, probably from the body of a vessel, the fabric is brown-grey in section, with remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text on the obverse and a further line on the reverse.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393537) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393537)
